Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2009 06:54PM GraceC wrote: It was REALLY wonderful meeting everyone at Kelly's.  Everyone was so nice and open and warm and fun.  Not to mention the wealth of information and the great FOOD and DRINKS (which I am particularly enjoying since finishing chemo recently and just starting to get my taste buds back) I agree with Crissy that I did feel connected with everyone who was there.  Thank you to Kelly for inviting me.  You have all mad an indelible mark.  I am looking forward to keeping in touch with all of you here and the girls who are close by hopefully we will get together again soon. You are all in my prayers.xoxo Graceanne
Posts.Title: This is the "What Would You Like To Bring to the Pahtay" Thread KellyC AnnNYC
